sentences.en: He argued persuasively, and was full of confidence.
sentences.cn: 他的论证很有说服力，且充满自信。

sentences.en: He speaks very persuasively but I feel in my bones that he is lying.
sentences.cn: 他的话颇有说服力,不过我直觉地感到他是在骗人.

sentences.en: He spoke a very persuasively but I smelled a rat and refused his offer.
sentences.cn: 他说得头头是道,但我觉得有些可疑,于是拒绝了他的建议.

sentences.en: Mr Mandelbaum has been preaching the gospel of petrol a long time, and does so persuasively.
sentences.cn: 曼德尔鲍姆长期以来一直在鼓吹汽油税“教义”, 他的鼓吹颇具说服力.

sentences.en: Rhetoric can be defined as the art of using language effectively and persuasively.
sentences.cn: 修辞是有效地或有说服力地运用语言的艺术.

sentences.en: Students find that all historians argue reasonably and persuasively.
sentences.cn: 学生们发现所有的历史学家都争论得有条有理,并且很有说服力.

sentences.en: The assessed presents ideas clearly and persuasively.
sentences.cn: 被评估者可以明确提出意见并具有说服力.

sentences.en: The stress formula of shaft wall is obtained , and an example is persuasively analyzed.
sentences.cn: 分析研究表明导致立井壁破坏的主要原因是井壁负摩擦力和温度应力.

words.tran_cn: 有说服力的；劝诱的，劝说的
说服，劝说；使某人相信；劝某人做（不做）某事
